question: [Challenge] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.

qas.question: [Challenge] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.
[Explain] Nederlands: Bepaal the intercept of the noisy line van de getekende lijn.
[Note] Italiano: Individua the value of y when x equals 1 della retta disegnata.
